De adhærendo Deo. English
titleStmt.author: Albertus, Magnus, Saint, 1193?-1280.

titleStmt.title: A treatise of adhering to God; written by Albert the Great, Bishop of Ratisbon. Put into English by Sir Kenelme Digby, Kt. Also a conference with a lady about choyce of religion.
De adhærendo Deo. English
titleStmt.author: Albertus, Magnus, Saint, 1193?-1280.
Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Herringman, at the Anchor in the New-Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
A translation of: De adhærendo Deo.
"A conference with a lady about choyce of religion" by Sir Kenelm Digby has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb [the] 9: 1653."; the 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
